mapper.select: select hour as id, hour as statTime, sum(if(orders_status=500,1,0)) as effectiveOrderNum, sum(if(orders_status=600,1,0)) as cancelOrderNum, sum(if(orders_status=700,1,0)) as closeOrderNum, sum(if(orders_status=500, total_amount, 0)) as effectiveOrderTotalAmount from history_orders_sync where day >= #{queryDay} GROUP BY hour
